crown.name: CSK_Module_MultiColorSelection
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_MultiColorSelection
crown.desc: Module to provide color selection functionality. Multiple instances can be created and will run in multiple threads on the device. + This module provides a UI for all relevant features. + {empty} + Typically to configure this module to work with other modules you should do this: + {empty} + 1) If multiple instances are needed, these can be added via addInstance(). + 2) Select the instance you want to configur via setInstance(). + 3) Set the event providing the images to be processed e.g. via setRegisterEvent('CSK_ImagePlayer.OnNewImage'). + 4) Other modules can react on the results of this module (see OnNewResultNUM and setResultOutput). +

item.desc: TOTAL: Forward only total result (e.g. TRUE).
item.name: TOTAL

item.desc: TOTAL+SUBRESULTS: Forward total result and subresutls (e.g. FALSE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE).
item.name: TOTAL_SUBRESULTS

item.desc: TOTAL+SUBVALUES: Forward total result and sub values (e.g. FALSE, 1,5,4).
item.name: TOTAL_SUBVALUES

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnNewInstanceList
event.desc: Notify list of instances.

event.name: OnNewProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances threads.

param.desc: Number of the instance to receive the parameter.
param.name: objectNo

param.desc: If parameter is for a specific colorObject, its number.
param.name: colorObject

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Notify selected instance.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewResultNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide result of instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

param.desc: Optional sub Results. See also setResultOutput().
param.name: subResults

event.name: OnNewPreFilterAOIChannel
event.desc: Notify channel of prefiltering AOI.

event.name: OnPreFilterAOIActive
event.desc: Notify activation status of AOI prefilter.

event.name: OnPreFilterAOIValues
event.desc: Notify values of AOI prefilter range.

event.name: OnNewSelectedStep
event.desc: Notify selected processing step of this module.

event.name: OnPreFilterAONIActive
event.desc: Notify activation status of AONI prefilter.

event.name: OnNewPreFilterAONIChannel
event.desc: Notify channel of prefiltering AONI.

event.name: OnPreFilterAONIValues
event.desc: Notify values of AONI prefilter range.

event.name: OnShowAOI
event.desc: Notify if AOI should be shown on UI.

event.name: OnNewShowImageChannel
event.desc: Notify image channel to use in UI viewer.

event.name: OnNewColorObjectSelection
event.desc: Notify currently selected color object.

event.name: OnNewObjectName
event.desc: Notify object name of currently selected color object.

event.name: OnNewStatusColorActive
event.desc: Notify if currently selected color is active.

event.name: OnNewColorValue
event.desc: Notify current color value of selected color object.

event.name: OnNewColorMode
event.desc: Notify current status of colorMode.

event.name: OnNewValueTolerance
event.desc: Notify tolerance value of currently selected color.

event.name: OnNewMinBlobSize
event.desc: Notify minimum of allowed size of blobs to be found.

event.name: OnNewMaxBlobSize
event.desc: Notify maximum allowed size of blobs to be found.

event.name: OnNewStatusPixelRefactorActive
event.desc: Notify if refactoring pixels to mm² is active for currently selected color.

event.name: OnNewPixelRefactorUnit
event.desc: Notify currently used unit for blobs.

event.name: OnNewPixelRefactor
event.desc: Notify currently used pixel refactor to calculate mm² out of pixels.

event.name: OnNewStatusROIActive
event.desc: Notify if ROI is active for currently selected color.

event.name: OnNewMinGood
event.desc: Notify minimum allowed amount of blobs to be found.

event.name: OnNewMaxGood
event.desc: Notify maximum allowed amount of blobs to be found.

event.name: OnNewStatusMaskActive
event.desc: Notify if masks are active for currently selected color.

event.name: OnROIEditorActive
event.desc: Notify if ROI editor is currently active in UI.

event.name: OnMaskEditorActive
event.desc: Notify current status of maskEditor.

event.name: OnPipetteActive
event.desc: Notify if pipette mode is currently active in UI.

event.name: OnNewSizeSmallestBlob
event.desc: Notify size of smallest found blob within allowed range.

event.name: OnNewSizeBiggestBlob
event.desc: Notify size of biggest found blob within allowed range.

event.name: OnNewFoundBlobs
event.desc: Notify amount of found blobs.

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to Forward thread internal values to e.g. be notified with single event related to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueToForward1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewImageQueue
event.desc: Notify size of image queue.

event.name: OnNewProcessingTime
event.desc: Notify processing time.

event.name: OnNewStatusShowImage
event.desc: Notify if image should be showed in UI.

event.name: OnNewValueUpdateNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to forward thread internal values to main thread to keep values in sync between threads. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueToForward1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

param.desc: Optionally color object for the value update.
param.name: selectedObject

event.name: OnNewResult
event.desc: Notify result of processing of currently selected instance. See also setResultOutput(). + Will forward the result of currently selected instance. (see setInstance()). +

event.name: OnNewTotalResult
event.desc: Notify total result of currently selected instance.

event.name: OnNewResultOutput
event.desc: Notify currently selected modus to forward results via event OnNewResult / OnNewResultNUM. + See setResultOutput().

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module for currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewStatusRegisteredEvent
event.desc: Notify event instance is registered to receive new image to process.

event.name: OnNewROIType
event.desc: Notify type of ROI.

event.name: OnNewMaskingROIType
event.desc: Notify type of maskingROI.

event.name: OnNewViewerID
event.desc: Notify viewerID for viewer in UI for currently selected instance.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/device boot up.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: setInstance
function.desc: Set instance to select (e.g. for further configurations on its parameters).

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get amount of created color selection instances.

function.name: setRegisterEvent
function.desc: Set event to listen for incoming images to process. Will be set for currently selected instance (see "setSelectedObject").

param.desc: Event name to register to ( e.g. CSK_ImagePlayer.OnNewImage).
param.name: event

function.name: processInstanceNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to process color selection. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "processInstance1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction".

function.name: setPreFilterAOIChannel
function.desc: Set image channel (HSV) to be used for prefiltering of AOI.

function.name: setPreFilterAOIActive
function.desc: Set if prefilter for AOI (area of interest) should be used.

function.name: setPreFilterAOIRange
function.desc: Range to be used for prefiltering AOI.

param.desc: Range (depends on used HSV channel) + Hue: 0 - 179 + Saturation: 0 - 255 + Value: 0 - 255.
param.name: values

function.name: setSelectedStep
function.desc: Set processing step of the color selection (used for UI).

param.desc: Processing step (1 of 5) + 1: Pre-Filter Area of interest + 2: Pre-Filter Area of NON interest + 3: Visualize image content of interest (to check) + 4 Object definition + 5: Processing
param.name: step

function.name: setPreFilterAONIActive
function.desc: Set if prefilter for AONI (area of non interest) should be used.

function.name: setPreFilterAONIChannel
function.desc: Set image channel (HSV) to be used for prefiltering of AONI.

function.name: setPreFilterAONIRange
function.desc: Range to be used for prefiltering AONI.

param.desc: Range (depends on used HSV channel) + Hue: 0 - 179 + Saturation: 0 - 255 + Value: 0 - 255
param.name: values

function.name: setShowAOI
function.desc: Set if result of active AOI (after prefiltering, Step3) should be shown in UI.

function.name: setShowImageChannel
function.desc: Set image channel to show in UI (HSV).

function.name: setColorObject
function.desc: Select color object.

function.name: setColorActive
function.desc: Set if color object is active.

function.name: setObjectName
function.desc: Function to specify a name for the currently selected color (e.g. 'blue pins').

function.name: setColorValue
function.desc: Function so set the color value.

param.desc: Color value ([0-179] for colors and [0-255] for grey values) + See also setColorMode().
param.name: value

function.name: setColorMode
function.desc: Function to set color mode (if color should be checked or only gray values).

function.name: setColorTolerance
function.desc: Function to set color tolerance to detect color. (Will extend the color value in both directions).

function.name: setMinBlobSize
function.desc: Function to set minimum size of blob(s) to find. + Value is in 'px' or 'mm²'. See also setPixelRefactor()...

function.name: setMaxBlobSize
function.desc: Function to set maximum size of blob(s) to find. + Value is in 'px' or 'mm²'. See also setPixelRefactor()...

function.name: setPixelRefactorActive
function.desc: Function to select if the px size values of found blobs should be recalculated to mm². + See also setPixelRefactor()

function.name: setPixelRefactor
function.desc: Function to set the factor to calculate mm² out of pixels. + Pixel values will be divided by this value.

function.name: setROIActive
function.desc: Function to select if color selection processing of currently selected color should only be done in a defined ROI.

function.name: setMaskingROIActive
function.desc: Function to select if currently selected color should use mask(s) to ignore areas of the image for the color selection processing.

function.name: setMinGood
function.desc: Function to set the minimum amount of blobs needed to be found in the image for a good measurement.

function.name: setMaxGood
function.desc: Function to set the maximum amount of blobs allowed to be found in the image for a good measurement.

function.name: setPipetteEditorActive
function.desc: Set status of pipette editor for selected color. + If TRUE, the viewer in the UI will install an editor for the pipette inside of the viewer to deifne an area within the image. + If FALSE it will calculate the mean value of the defined area to be used for the color value. +

function.name: setROIEditor
function.desc: Set status of ROI editor for selected color. + If TRUE, the viewer in the UI will install an editor for the ROI. + If FALSE it will update the masks accordingly.

function.name: setMaskEditor
function.desc: Set status of mask editor for selected color. + If TRUE, the viewer in the UI will install an editor for the mask(s). + If FALSE it will update the masks accordingly.

function.name: resetROI
function.desc: Function to reset the configured ROI.

function.name: resetMask
function.desc: Function to reset the configured masks to only a single mask.

function.name: setShowImage
function.desc: Function to select if image should be shown on UI.

function.name: setResultOutput
function.desc: Function to select modus to forward results via event OnNewResult / OnNewResultNUM.

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single instance. + IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript").

function.name: addMaskingROI
function.desc: Function to add a mask for currently selected color.

function.name: setROIType
function.desc: Function to set the type of ROI.

function.name: setMaskingROIType
function.desc: Function to set type of mask(s).
